column4: "heavy on the tongue; but how Catelyn had dreaded those smiles. The sourleaf had stained Masha"

"sighed with exasperation.  Catelyn took his arm. "Come; Father;" she said. "You'll find that Masha"
"before Catelyn reached out to silence him; her fingers tightening hard around his forearm.  Masha"
